machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G21       ;metric values
G90       ;absolute positioning
M100 ({he1st:{print_temperature}})
M100 ({out4:0})
;reset offsets
G92.1 X0 Y0 Z0 A0 B0
;home
G28.2 X0 Y0
G28.2 Z0
;z-level z bed
G0 Z6
G38.2 Z-10 F200
G0 Z5
G0 X195 Y75 ; don't go too far or the probe won't see the bed
G38.2 Z-10 F200
G0 Z5
G0 X5 Y5
G38.2 Z-10 F200
G0 Z5
M100 ({tram:1})
;reset A
G92 A0
;goto Z5 and then put in the offset
G0 Z5
G55 ; apply offsets
;Wait for temp
M101 ({he1at:t}) ; wait
G0 X0 Y0 Z0.3 A1 ; and go to 0,0 and string out extra
G92 A0
; Layer 0
G0 Z0.5
G1 X3.000 Y3; rapid
; bead-prime
G1 X215.000 A19 F1200
G0 Z0.3
;reset A
G92 A0

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;End GCode
G91              ; relative positioning
G0 A-4.5
G90              ; absolute positioning
G28.2 X0 Y0
M100 ({he1st:0}) ; extruder heater off
M100 ({out4:0})  ; fan off
